body:
Hello, today I've came here to discuss a discussion that just recently popped up in my head. I've noticed that regular refs/officials name doesn't pop up in a color on the forums. My suggestion is we can have colors for them since we are basically on the staff team. Ref colors could be a sorta light sky blue color while with the official rank, the color could be a cyan color. Leave feedback below! 
Thanks.
